statsAutres.cImmune: to blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, stunned.

features.description: You lie dormant until a creature moves within 10 ft. of you. You may then activate immediately and use Noxious Miasma. You remain active for up to 1 minute.

features.name: Noxious Miasma
features.description: Save: DC 12 vs CON, reach 10 ft., all creatures in reach. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) poison damage.
